ygData.subject: RE: [archive-crawler] Confused about DecideRuleSequence in Heritrix3.x
ygData.msgSnippet: It is just as meaningful for a DecideRule to return an ACCEPT as it is to return a REJECT. A return of NONE is, however, passing the buck. Saying I have no
